titleStmt.title: A salutation of love from the opening of the springs of eternall life unto the flock of God in bonds or else where scattered upon the earth, but are one in the endlesse life of God from a Freind [sic] to all the upright hearted people of God that wait for the building of distressed Syon, known by the name of Robert Lodge.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Robert, ca. 1636-1690.

titleStmt.title: A salutation of love from the opening of the springs of eternall life unto the flock of God in bonds or else where scattered upon the earth, but are one in the endlesse life of God from a Freind [sic] to all the upright hearted people of God that wait for the building of distressed Syon, known by the name of Robert Lodge.
titleStmt.author: Lodge, Robert, ca. 1636-1690.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
